name: upad
tag_list: rental, property, landlord, tenant, renter, management
overview:
upad.co.uk provides over 7m renters a free data resource, listing every current UK residential property available to let, enabling them to search on key criteria, such as off-street parking, Wi-Fi or transport connections.

upad.co.uk is interactive. Users can refer to the Rental Index for specific postcodes and property sizes, book viewings, review local information, receive property alerts, ask questions in the Rental Surgery, search the wiki, download guides and forms, rate landlords, provide feedback and much more besides. All this information is free.

As a single brand distribution point, upad.co.uk provides over 1.5m landlords a one stop shop; for Â£59, a property is uploaded until let, and listed on the businessâ€™ network of property portals (Propertyfinder, Rightmove, etc), meta portals (Globrix, Nestoria, etc) and listing sites (Gumtree, Houseladder, etc). Landlords can utilise upad.co.ukâ€˜s white labelled property management solution.
